name: ANKI
description: "ANKI" is a new platform, arcade, puzzle , game made by an independent artist Wojciech Krupinski. Incredibly addictive idea, which is teleport from left to right and from top to bottom, the author provides us with nice and pleasant moments. The gameplay will absorbs us utterly. "ANKI" is waiting for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: CPU Pentium 3, 800 Mhz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Video Any 3D capable card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or Athlon 64 X2 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video Any 3D capable card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: It's not a terribly difficult game, and you'll probably finish it before all the cards drop, but there are certainly worse ways to spend a buck or less if it's on sale. It's a capable platformer that controls well and plays well. The only real complaint I had was the enemies that shoot things randomly, I died a few times just by being unlucky, whereas if they had an actual pattern, it would be a bit less cheap. But it didn't happen often enough to make the game unenjoyable. Certainly worth picking up.
